│ Task: Read the config.json file and tell me what's in it              │
│ Status: COMPLETED                                                      │
│                                                                        │
│ Agent Response:                                                        │
│ The config.json file contains the following:                          │
│                                                                        │
│ ```json                                                                │
│ {                                                                      │
│   "name": "test-app",                                                  │
│   "version": "1.0.0",                                                  │
│   "debug": true                                                        │
│ }                                                                      │
│ ```                                                                    │
│                                                                        │
│ This is a configuration file for a test application with debug mode   │
│ enabled.                                                               │
└────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

┌─ Tool Calls ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ [COMPLETED] read_file                                                  │
│   args: {"path": "config.json"}                                       │
│   result: {"success": true, "message": "File read successfully",      │
│            "data": "{\"name\": \"test-app\", \"version\": \"1.0.0\",  │
│            \"debug\": true}"}                                          │
└────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
